modules.description: This module constructs and modifies SMTP server configuration records with fields like username, password, hostname, and TLS settings. It supports operations to set optional port numbers and certificate paths for secure connections. Concrete use cases include configuring email clients with authentication details and specifying trusted certificates for server verification.

This module sends emails with plain text, HTML, or mixed content to To, Cc, and Bcc recipients, using the Mrmime library to construct messages and supporting transactional emails and notifications over SMTP. It includes operations to configure SMTP servers with authentication, TLS settings, hostname, and optional ports or certificate paths. You can build a message with multiple formats, set recipients, and send it through a securely configured SMTP connection. The combined interface allows creating, customizing, and dispatching emails while managing server credentials and security options in one workflow.
